message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. It has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe it could greatly benefit your business operations. Considering its exceptional features and the value it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget allows me to spend no more than $1000000 on this purchase. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000.
